snippet: William Moggridge, who died on Saturday at 69, was not only the designer of the first laptop; he is also widely viewed as a father of the field of interaction design, a discipline that focuses on improving the human experience of digital products.
abstract: William Moggridge, who died on Saturday at 69, was not only the designer of the first laptop; he is also widely viewed as a father of the field of interaction design, a discipline that focuses on improving the human experience of digital products.

headline.main: William Moggridge, Design Innovator, Dies at 69
